title: In the Spotlight: Interesting Marketing and Media Jobs
content: Are you a media or marketing communications professional? Are you currently looking for your next big opportunity? It can be an exhausting process to find the best openings and get your credentials in front of the right people. Adpulp wants to help. SENIOR DIGITAL CREATIVE DIRECTOR | National Geographic | Washington, DC The Senior Digital Creative Director for National Geographic will define the visual direction and user experience for our owned and operated and licensed digital products. This role will work closely with Product, Technology, Editorial, Brand & Marketing, and Advertising teams to deliver experiences that delight our consumers and meet a wide range of enterprise goals. The ideal candidate has extensive experience creating product design systems, impeccable typographic skills, and a desire to build human-centered content experiences that amplify our storytelling while serving the needs of our audiences on our website, on a mobile device, or on a partner platform. Leading Digital Design, this role will cultivate and empower a strong Product Experience Design team and will build relationships across National Geographic Partners to understand the business, priorities, and opportunities for exceptional creative internally and outside the company. SENIOR CONTENT PRODUCER | EP+Co | Greenville, SC We are doing great things at EP+Co and looking for a Senior Content Producer that can join our team of makers, doers and the thinkers to help brands chart new paths into the culture. The Senior Producer is a creative advertising practitioner with special skills in film and sound. He/she is responsible for bringing the creative concept to life via TV, radio, video, etc. and by managing all production activities including director search, studio /supplier negotiation and bidding, pre-production preparation, shooting, recording, editing, and final shipping. Prior agency experience is required. COPYWRITER | The Integer Group | Denver, CO At The Integer Group, we’re looking for a Copywriter in our Denver office. Working under the direction of the Creative Director, the Copywriter develops copy for a full range of creative / marketing ideas from concept through printed/produced materials with an emphasis on creating dramatic results for our clients. Copywriters utilize their exceptional ability to concept ideas and exercise strategic thinking in all marketing materials and channels. Teamwork is paramount for success in this role as the Copywriter will work closely with Art Directors and other team members to develop a final visual product. In Related News… Did you know there are over 250 over-the-top channels available to media consumers today? Imagine how many people it takes to create all the programming and the ads. By the way, over-the-top content is the audio, video, and other media content delivered over the Internet without the involvement of a multiple-system operator who is in control of distribution. In others words, OTT is direct to consumer. Good luck finding the work you want (and the work that wants you). Related Comments comments
